title: Shitty Neighbor That Hates You For Playing Music

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Check your target.
- Attack a player at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, you'll be told if any roles reference music of any kind, and how many.
- If any do, you'll be able to discover that by checking a target.
- If there are any alive and you attack someone whose role doesn't, you are roleblocked the next night.
- If none are alive, you have no penalty for killing anyone.
- To appease Noodle, this role can also be referred to as "Shitty Neighbor".

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Mafia goal but you're not allowed to sing it
